channel.title: No .exe File
channel.description: i installed the game and Source SDK but cant see game launcher anywhere, there's no exe file in a folder where i installed it, and it doesn't appear in Steam.. i've been waiting this game for so long, and now i wanna kill myself :smiley:

item.title: No .exe File
item.dc:creator: harunjuhasz
item.description:
Create a shortcut with these settings:

“x:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\Steam.exe” -applaunch 218 -game “x:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS”

Where “x” is the drive you installed the programs.

Taken from this thread https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13479

Read full topic

It uses hl2.exe and its located
Steam\steamapps\your name\source sdk base 2007

item.title: No .exe File
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
If you just downloaded the BlackMesa.7z file for the mod make sure you extract it here.

Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS

Once done restart steam and it should show up.

Edit, also you need Source SDK Base 2007 (Mod Engine), not Source SDK (Mapping tool).

Read full topic
